7. 1ml sterile tips (2 boxes) and pipette
8. 200μl sterile tips (2 boxes) and pipette
9. Selenite F broth (10ml in each tube, 29 tubes)
10. Sterile 1.5ml eppendorf tubes (116 eppendorfs)
a. DNA Zap solution A and B
11. DNA extraction kit (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dicr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kl3p","text":"Molecular Laboratory:

2. 70% ethanol
3. Master mix (TaqMan Environmental Mastermix)
4. Primer F (ST/SPTA)
5. Primer R (ST/SPTA)
6. Probe (ST/SPTA)
7. dH2O
8. Template DNA
9. Sterile eppendorf
10. PCR strips
11. 10μl tips (3 boxes) and pipette
12. 20μl sterile tips (1 box) and pipette
13. 200μl sterile tips (1 box) and pipette
14. 1ml sterile tips (1 box) and status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Turbidity Testing
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fb3jc","text":"2ml of sample (from 5ml separated for Phage Screening) is taken in a sterile glass\r\ntube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Turbidity Testing
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"24j81","text":"Turbidity is measured by densitometry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Differential Centrifugation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3rj5","text":"Spin down 45ml of collected water sample at 2000rpm for 1 min to separate out larger\r\ndebris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Differential Centrifugation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"erjjo","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a new sterile 50ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Differential Centrifugation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"mpa4","text":"Centrifuge at 4000rpm for 25mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Differential Centrifugation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7upo2","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 0.5ml of sterile D/w.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Enrichment and DNA extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a6e8o","text":"Transfer 0.5ml of resuspended pellet into 10ml of Selenite F broth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Enrichment and DNA extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1dpju","text":"Transfer 1ml of this suspension to a sterile 1.5ml tube for DNA extraction for T0.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Enrichment and DNA extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1hq5r","text":"Incubate the inoculated Selenite F broth overnight (16hrs) at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Enrichment and DNA extraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"89rbv","text":"At the end of incubation, transfer 1ml of the o/n growth to 1.5ml tube for DNA\r\nextraction at T16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bcq83","text":"Transfer 1ml of bacterial suspension in SF broth to 1.5ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"19hrb","text":"Centrifuge at 2000rpm for 2mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2t3kh","text":"Discard the Supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ai77","text":"Resuspend pellet in 200 μl PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"afof8","text":"Add 20 μl proteinase K.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5j43n","text":"Add 200 μl buffer AL. Mix thoroughly by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c7qkv","text":"Incubate for 10mins at 55°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d41m0","text":"Add 200 μl ethanol (96-100%) and mix thoroughly by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9b2qq","text":"Transfer the mixture into a DNeasy Mini spin column placed in a 2ml collection tube. Centrifuge at 8000rpm for 1min. Discard the flow-through and replace a new collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"16i1c","text":"Add 500 μl Buffer AW1 to the column and centrifuge at 8000rpm for 1 min. Discard flow-through and replace a new collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ers07","text":"Add 500 μl Buffer AW2 to the column and centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 3 mins. Discard flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"efiu5","text":"Transfer the collection tube to a new 1.5ml microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA extraction (DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit Cat# 69504)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4iuns","text":"Elute the DNA by adding 60 μl Buffer AE to the center of the spin column membrane. Incubate for 1 min at room temperature. Centrifuge at 8000 rpm for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Real time PCR (Adapted from Tran Vu Thieu Nga)
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3gil","text":"Primer preparation
Primers/probes are shipped in lyophilized form and need to be constituted with TE buffer or nuclease
free dH2O. Make the primary primer/probe stock solution of 100 μM.
Amount of nuclease free dH2O= 10 µl × X ng
Here, X is the amount of primer/probe provided by the manufacturer.
Generally, use the following formula to find unknown volume or concentration.
C1*V1 = C2*V2
Where,
C1 = Initial concentration.
V1 = Initial volume.
C2 = Final concentration.
V2 = Final volume.
Here, for this protocol, we used a portion of the 100 μM primers/probes to make 10 μM/μl solutions
to use as working solutions. Aliquot the working solution into 5 separate tubes and store at -20 °C to
avoid contamination and multiple freeze-thawing cycles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Real time PCR (Adapted from Tran Vu Thieu Nga)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ernvb","text":"Master mix  setup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eucmj","text":"Master mix hi/Paratyphi-A qPCR: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d4pf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
